description: Represents a smart reply generated by AI with different message formats for various communication channels.

uid.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the smart reply

created_at.description: The timestamp when the smart reply was created, in ISO 8601 format

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the smart reply was last updated, in ISO 8601 format

display.description: Contains display-related information for the smart reply.

btn_text.description: A human-readable title for the smart reply button.

reason.description: The reason why this smart reply was generated, providing context for decision-making.

payload.description: Contains the generated reply messages for different communication channels.

email_message.description: The generated reply formatted for email communication

sms_message.description: The generated reply formatted for SMS communication

FB_message.description: The generated reply formatted for Facebook messaging

other_message.description: The generated reply formatted for other communication channels

evidence.description: Supporting statements or facts that led to the generation of this smart reply. Can be an array of strings or a single string.

matter_uid.description: The unique identifier of the associated matter
